source.oracleReaderQuery:
Select OBJECT_NAME 
FROM ALL_OBJECTS 
WHERE OBJECT_NAME IN (
'ATEL_ACCOUNTSELECTION'
,'ATEL_BOOKSTRUCTURE'
,'ATEL_POSTINGPARAMETER'
,'SDKCLIENTS'
,'SDKCURRENCIES'
,'SDKDETAILSCOPES'
,'SDKLOVS'
,'SDKLOVVALUES'
,'SDKMATURITYRULES'
,'SDKSYSTEMPARAMETERS'
,'SDKUNITS'
,'SDKUSERLOVVALUES'
,'SDKUSERS'
,'SD_ANLAGEN'
,'SD_ANLAGENTYPEN'
,'SD_ANSCHRIFTEN'
,'SD_BELEGTYPEN'
,'SD_BILLMARKET'
,'SD_BUSINESSAREAS'
,'SD_DETAILPROPERTIES'
,'SD_DETAILS'
,'SD_DETAILTYPES'
,'SD_DOMAINWERTE'
,'SD_FIBU'
,'SD_HOLIDAYS'
,'SD_HOLIDAYZONE'
,'SD_KONTAKTE'
,'SD_KUNDEN'
,'SD_LOVVALUE'
,'SD_MANDANTEN'
,'SD_PERSONEN'
,'SD_POSTINGTYPE'
,'SD_RECHNUNGEN'
,'SD_RECHNUNGSPOS'
,'SD_TAXCODE'
,'SD_TRADECONTRACT'
,'SD_TRADECONTRACTDET'
,'SD_USER'
,'SD_VERTRAEGE'
,'SD_VERTRAGSGRUPPEN'
,'SD_VERTRAGSTYPEN'
,'SD_WAEHRUNGEN'
,'ALPIQ_SCHEDULE_MAPPING'
) 
AND OWNER = 'PS_ADMIN'

activities.name: LookupTableList
activities.description: Retrieve the table list from Azure SQL database

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT TABLE_SCHEMA, TABLE_NAME FROM information_schema.TABLES WHERE TABLE_TYPE = 'BASE TABLE' and TABLE_SCHEMA = 'SalesLT' and TABLE_NAME <> 'ProductModel'
select MAX(LastModifytime) as NewWatermarkvalue from data_source_table

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from data_source_table where LastModifytime > '@{activity('LookupOldWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.WatermarkValue}' and LastModifytime <= '@{activity('LookupNewWaterMarkActivity').output.firstRow.NewWatermarkvalue}'

properties.description: ESI13T Connection with the BUSINESSOBJECTS user
ET51Q DB Connection for the BUSINESSOBJECTS user

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		surname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLCustomer
source(output(
		cust_id as integer,
		street as string,
		num as string,
		zip as integer,
		city as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> AzureSQLCustAddr
AzureSQLCustomer, AzureSQLCustAddr join(id == cust_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SinkToBlob
